javadoc:
Class to build the Ghidra classpath, add it to the {@link GhidraClassLoader}, and start the 
 desired {@link GhidraLaunchable} that's passed in as a command line argument.

methods.name: main
methods.comment: Launches the given GhidraLaunchable, passing through the args to it.

params.name: args
params.comment:
The first argument is the name of the class to launch.  The remaining args
     get passed through to the class's GhidraLaunchable#launch method.

throws.comment:
If there was a problem launching.  See the exception's message for more
     details on what went wrong.

methods.name: findJarsInDir
methods.comment: Searches the given directory (non-recursively) for jars and returns their paths in a list.

params.name: dir
params.comment: The directory to search for jars in.

return.comment: A list of discovered jar paths.

name: GhidraLauncher
comment:
Class to build the Ghidra classpath, add it to the GhidraClassLoader, and start the 
 desired GhidraLaunchable that's passed in as a command line argument.
